devdoc.details: Main contract, used to create collections and mint cards.

OwnableInvalidOwner(address).details: The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)

OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address).details: The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation.

params._expectedCount: Expected number of cards in the collection

params._cardIds: Array of card ids to add to the booster
params._to: Address to mint the booster to

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

_collectionsByName.details: Mapping of collection names to collections

devdoc.title: Main

constructor.notice: Constructor, which takes the address of the Card contract.

createCollection(string,uint256).notice: Create a new collection of cards.

mintBooster(address,string,uint256[]).notice: Mint a booster of cards with `_boosterUri` as the token URI and add the cards `_cardIds` to the booster while transferring them to `_to`.

mintCardForCollection(address,string).notice: Mint a new card and add it to the provided collection.

mintCardsForCollection(address,string[]).notice: Mint multiple cards and add them to the provided collection.

transferCard(address,uint256).notice: Transfer a card to an address.

transferCards(address,uint256[]).notice: Transfer multiple cards to an address.

userdoc.notice: This contract is used to create collections, mint cards and also used to transfer cards to other addresses, since we assume it's the owner of the Card contract and therefore is the original owner of all cards.
